title: (Standard Design Manual) - Downloaded By: David Cornealius, At: 2025-12-25 14:53

rules.description: If the shortcut for the macro has been installed on your desktop, double-click the 'sched.mac'
Otherwise, skip steps 1 through 3 and proceed to step 4.
Press the 'F5' key and then skip to step 5.
This macro will do the following:
create the appropriate MS Excel file (wl1.xls)
run and print the Header Design Schedule to the default printer
You can also run the macro from within Impromptu by selecting 'Macro...', from the 'Tools'
Retrieve the Header Design Schedule from the default printer for your Pc.
The Microsoft Project file, Drafting Schedule.mpp, is on the server and is available for anyone
IfMS Project is running from the server on your PC, open the file,
3. Microsoft Project will warn you that the file contains macros. Select the 'Enable Macros'
Type 'Ctrl-T'. Skip step 5 and proceed to step 6.
You will receive the following warning message:
